author: clelange
body: These are the collected HGCal reconstruction (clustering) as in #18236 plus the two missing `numeric` includes to fix potential gcc6/7 compilation errors about `std::iota`. I backported them to CMSSW_9_1_X, performed `git cms-checkdeps -a` and compiled the full code successfully. These changes are required in 91X for the HGCal TDR.
title: PR #18236 backport to 91X
